snippet.title: Strange Antiquities - Official Gameplay Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
Check out the Strange Antiquities gameplay reveal trailer for a look at the upcoming project from the creators of puzzle game, Strange Horticulture. Join John and Rob from Bad Viking as they discuss and give us an in-depth look at the game's mechanics.
Set in a cozy, candlelit shop dealing in arcane artifacts, Strange Antiquities puts players in the shoes of an apprentice Thaumaturge. As the apprentice, you'll identify and catalogue strange items and navigate the intricate web of secrets in Undermere alongside your cat, Jupiter.
Strange Antiquities is coming to PC (Steam).
